rookie-ping-master.name: Ping Master
rookie-ping-master.description: Awarded for mastering the basic network reconnaissance tools.

password-breacher-bronze.name: Password Breacher
password-breacher-bronze.description: Awarded for successfully identifying leaked credentials.

quantum-infiltrator-gold.name: Quantum Infiltrator
quantum-infiltrator-gold.description: Awarded for exposing the identity of the elusive hacker 'Nyx'.

server-spectre-diamond.name: Server Spectre
server-spectre-diamond.description: Awarded for expertly tracing and neutralizing a server intruder (Ghost in the Server).

phish-spotter-bronze.name: Phish Spotter
phish-spotter-bronze.description: Awarded for successfully identifying and analyzing a phishing attempt.

network-sniffer-silver.name: Network Sniffer
network-sniffer-silver.description: Awarded for proficient packet analysis and network intrusion detection.

malware-analyst-gold.name: Malware Analyst
malware-analyst-gold.description: Awarded for extracting malware signatures and understanding binary threats.

osint-master-gold.name: OSINT Master
osint-master-gold.description: Awarded for advanced open-source intelligence gathering and alias uncovering.

image-forensics-bronze.name: Image Forensics Expert
image-forensics-bronze.description: Awarded for analyzing surveillance images and recognizing patterns.

steganography-expert-silver.name: Steganography Expert
steganography-expert-silver.description: Awarded for finding hidden data within images and other files.

usb-forensics-bronze.name: USB Forensics Specialist
usb-forensics-bronze.description: Awarded for investigating suspicious USB drives and recovering hidden files.

digital-forensics-bronze.name: Digital Sleuth
digital-forensics-bronze.description: Awarded for uncovering clues from browser history and digital trails.

log-analyst-bronze.name: Log Analyst
log-analyst-bronze.description: Awarded for proficiently analyzing server logs to detect anomalies.

unassigned-badge.name: Unassigned Badge
unassigned-badge.description: A placeholder badge for missions not yet assigned a specific reward.
